text: Im svoystvenno vnimatel'no slushat' togo, kto propoveduyet ili chitayet slova Allakha - Yego ayaty. Oni razumeyut ikh, i ikh serdtsa vosprinimayut to, chto im chitayetsya, i ikh dushi otkryvayutsya navstrechu etim Svyashchennym slovam. Oni ne takiye, kak te, kotoryye glukhi k slovam Allakha i otvrashchayutsya ot nikh i v ushi kotorykh ne pronikayut eti Svyashchennyye slova, i glaza i serdtsa kotorykh ne vosprinimayut suti etikh slov
